title: Blended Learning Design for Collective Knowledge Building: Advanced Mathematics Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Non-degree adult learner program combining project collaboration and online discussions on a smartphone-based LMS

learning_goals: Learners submit three digital portfolios sharing mathematical problem-solving strategies developed collaboratively with peers within one week
Learners provide at least five feedback sessions on peers' knowledge-building processes in online discussions, fulfilling collective cognitive responsibility
Learners develop at least two real-world application cases of mathematical concepts through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
